name: Decked Out Clone
description:
Decked out is  Deck Building, Dungeon Crawling, Treasure Hunting, Collect-em-all, Trading Game! I could only include Treasure Hunting and Dungeon Crawling.

PLEASE READ

Instructions:

You must plunge deep into the dungeon and collect all of the gold bars scattered around after the earthquake. But be careful! The beast could pop out at any second...

WASD - Move

E - Interact/Pick Up

PS. I smashed my desk and that's how some of my music was made.
